CustomField.inlineHelpText: Use this field to link Stock Units to a specific head office. When completed this means this Stock Unit is reserved for this head office only. Remove the field value if assigned to a POS Solution and/or if no longer Stock.
CustomField.label: Head Office

filterItems.value: Head Office, IKA Head Office, NKA Head Office, IKA In-Fill Head Office, NKA In-Fill Head Office
